Tucson nodds, but then something else comes into mind.  He had felt a great=
 power within him, and with Rodimus there, he felt it even more.  He puts a=
 hand on his chest.

"Hmmm?  This is strange, ever since we've been talking=
 here together, I sense an increase of power in my spark..  I wonder...  Ro=
dimus your plan is fail safe, but something inside me is trying to tell me =
that we should stick together...   Almost as if...."

Straight Shot transfo=
rms and lands between them.

"Power link.  That's the word you're trying to=
 get out Tucson, Powerlink.  Y'know?  It's when two Autobots transform and =
merge into one highly powerful warrior.  You guys are both Primes, and I be=
t you two can power link.  That's what that little voice inside you is tell=
ing you Tucson.  And that'll explain the power increaes you feel, whenever =
you're with Rodimus.  Well, that's if it is possible, not sure though..  Ju=
st think imagine what you guys could accomplish if you could do that?  And =
Rodimus could become your eyes and you can become his strength.  And since =
sometimes you guys have different views, you can share them when you're lin=
ked together.  And the more you share, the more well rounded you become.  K=
nowledge is power, and that's one thing we got that Hydras doesn't have."

=
Tucson turns his head toward Rodimus.

"I - I have never tried that...  Tha=
t's up to you if you wish to attempt it, Rodimus.."

Rat Trap steps in.

"Y=
ou're missn' out on a power play if ya don't try it.  Flatten Hydras, stomp=
 out those big bad bugs...  Powerlinking will give you guys the umph it's g=
onna take ta take ta not only exterminate those overgrown pests, but it'll =
really put Hydras in his place." 

Tucson turns to Rat Trap.

" A power pla=
y huh?  I'm willing to try it, but Rodimus has to also agree to something l=
ike this.  It's not something I can do without his permission."

Rat Trap n=
odds.

"Atta boy Wheels.  And I can't think of anyone else who'd make a pow=
erful statement other than you guys."

Tucson turns his head to Rodimus and=
 waits for his reply.
